name: Ambushed (David Andrei)
description:
Ambushed is an awesome game where  you can shoot other planes and try to get as many kills as possible!

Tip - Anything that's red, don't fly into it!

-------------------------------------------------------

If you want a really cool 2D pixel art game made in Unity, Check out my Fiverr gig!

https://www.fiverr.com/davidandreia/make-you-a-fantastic-2d-game-in-unity
